name: desktop-styles
description: A set of JavaFX styles easily imported with SCSS.
author: @theoliverlear - Oliver Lear Sigwarth

scripts.version:exists: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const v=pkg.version; const name=pkg.name.startsWith('@')?pkg.name:'@theoliverlear/'+pkg.name; try{execSync('npm view '+name+'@'+v+' version',{stdio:'ignore'}); console.log(name+'@'+v+' exists on registry'); process.exit(0);}catch(e){ console.log(name+'@'+v+' does not exist on registry'); process.exit(1);}"
